detail_desc: Short shorts in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high, elasticated waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed fastening and patch side pockets.
Short dress in patterned jersey with a draped V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Long sleeves, cuffs with metal buttons, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and raw-edge sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Unlined.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a small fabric appliqué at the top, an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and low crotch. Zipped side pockets, a welt back pocket with a concealed press-stud and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Suit trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication at the back and pleats at the front, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Diagonal front pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Blouse in airy fabric with a gathered, elasticated boat neck, long, wide raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub jersey with an open chest pocket with a small appliqué at the top. Short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Poncho in an airy weave with a decorated hem.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a wide neckline, elastication and a flounce with broderie anglaise at the top, and a smocked hem.
Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a sewn-in wrapover and pleats, and a flared peplum.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short 5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a shimmering finish and zip fly with a button.
Metal hoop earrings. Two different sizes: 4.5 cm and 7.5 cm.
Necklaces in various lengths and designs. One choker and two slightly longer necklaces. Adjustable length 33.5-40 cm, 49-55 cm and 57.5-64 cm.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short top with a slightly wider neckline, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Shorts with wide, covered elastication at the waist and contrasting colour trims at the sides and hems.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs and wide ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with matt press-studs on one shoulder, twisted seams at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in stretch jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short skirt in a softly draping weave with a high waist and detachable tie belt. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and pleats at the top to create soft draping. Unlined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front pockets in the side seams and flap chest pockets with a button. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Sleeveless top in ribbed cotton jersey with an embroidered frill trim at the top and over the shoulder straps.
Plastic hair clip. Width 7.5 cm.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt front pockets with a press-stud, and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Wide coat in a felted weave with notch lapels and buttons at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, welt side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs that finish just above the knees with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Faux-fur trimmed hood lined with supersoft pile, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and an internal drawstring at the waist. Discreet pockets in the seams and zipped front pockets with a decorative flap. Lined in supersoft pile.

Short dress in sturdy jersey with lace trims. Round, lace-trimmed neckline, a concealed zip at the back, long sleeves and cuffs with concealed buttons. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy weave with lace trims and embroidery at the top. Small stand-up collar with a frill trim and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Yoke with a lace trim at the front and gathers at the back. Frill trim at the shoulders, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs with frill trims. Unlined.
A-line blouse in an airy viscose weave with a shirt front and long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in glittery, lightweight jersey with crossover straps at the top of the back. Slightly longer at the back.

Bag in a patterned weave with that can also be worn as a backpack. Padded shoulder straps that unfasten and can be concealed in one of the outer compartments. Four outer compartments, two of which are smaller, a two-way zip and a tab with a plastic fastener. Two handles at the top that can be fastened together with a hook and loop tab, one zipped, mesh inner compartment and a padded laptop compartment. Size 15x30x42 cm.
Elasticated fabric scrunchies.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Short dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Flounces down the front and back and 3/4-length, puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Recycled polyester lining.
Loafers in imitation leather with a metal chain and fringes at the front. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles.

Playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a cut-out section at the back with a sewn-on bow at the top. Wide, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Loafers in velour with cotton canvas linings, quilted satin insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Shopper in braided paper straw with a fringed top edge and two handles at the top. Lined. Depth 16 cm. Height approx. 26 cm. Width approx. 30 cm.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y), long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Lightly brushed inside.

Dress in viscose twill with embroidery, a collar and button placket. Flap chest pocket with a button, a gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, grosgrain button band with concealed buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Bras in cotton jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Super push-up bra in microfibre with mesh at the back. Adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Microfibre and lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Short dress in viscose jersey with a round neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved dress in velour with a V-neck and wrapover front. Lined.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of leggings in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif, dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Metal hoop earrings with pendants in plastic and metal. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 3 cm.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Satin top with lace at the back, a V-neck with a lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps.
Blouse in a soft, textured weave with a V-neck, wide, gathered balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Ankle-length, wide culottes in velour with an elasticated waist.
Shirt in an airy weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Blouse in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Straight-cut, sleeveless top in woven fabric with a wide neckline and foldover turtle neck. Concealed zip in the back and slits in the sides.
Vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps.
Cardigan in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats and elastication at the back. Side pockets and a sewn-in belt at the front with a covered metal buckle. Unlined.

Short dress in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Double-layered stand-up collar and an opening at the back with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Short, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a seam at the waist with a narrow drawstring that ties at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a jacquard-knit viscose and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck top in airy, crinkled chiffon with lace sections and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pouch in transparent plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 9x10x18 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset and a string back.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in sturdy, washed denim with an extra-high waist, detachable D-ring belt and zip fly with a button. Loose fit with gently tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, decorative crossover elastic straps at the hem, and a narrow fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
